item.title: How Anyone Can Download and Use Historical Weather Data in Python's Pandas Library
item.description: There's a wealth of data out there for anyone who understands how to access it! - Global Historical Climatology Network Weather Data In the United States, an organization called the Global Historical Climatology Network (GHCN) maintains over 100,000 weather stations. These stations record daily statistics like maximum/minimum temperature, precipitation amounts, snow levels, and more. This data is made freely available to the public. This is an...
